content: > love marly bird patterns become a > marly bird insider for sneak peeks > exclusive discounts and > behind-the-scenes yarny goodness > https //marlybird kit com/insider **boothbay harbor crochet shawl** the boothbay harbor crochet shawl is a classic triangle shawl featuring an airy lace stitch pattern and elegant drape worked from the long edge down the design creates a timeless silhouette that s perfect for layering in any season the rhythmic stitch pattern makes this a relaxing project once established and stitch diagrams are included for crocheters who enjoy visual guidance free pattern on my website https //marlybird com/blog/boothbay-harbor-crochet-shawl-pattern/ 1 an ad-free printable pdf is also available if you prefer a clean download **pattern details** triangle shawl worked flat finished size approx 68 5 wide x 37 deep without edging gauge 5 chain-5 spaces x 5 row = 6 x 3 25 includes written instructions and stitch diagrams hashtags #mmmdi #marlybird 1 https //marlybird com/blog/boothbay-harbor-crochet-shawl-pattern/
